definition: Hulunbuir prefecture-level city in Inner Mongolia
Hulunbuir prefecture-level city in Inner Mongolia

pinyin: Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3 cao3 yuan2

definition: Hulunbeir league (equivalent to prefecture), Inner Mongolia
Niels Henrik Abel (1802-1829), Norwegian mathematician/(math.) abelian
Habel, Haber or Hubbell (name)/Harbel (town in Liberia)

pinyin: Ke4 li3 si1 ting1 · Bei4 er3

sentences.english: Rooney, in turn, has created only one for Berbatov.
sentences.chinese: 反过来，鲁尼仅仅助攻贝尔巴托夫一次。

sentences.english: Bill didn't go to college, now that he was apprenticed to a carpenter.
sentences.chinese: 贝尔没有去上大学，因为他学徒做了木匠。

sentences.english: He would give entire earnings to Campbell's family from succeeding bouts.
sentences.chinese: 而他以后比赛的所有奖金将全部交给坎贝尔的家人。

sentences.english: Bell sitting on his roof, sings delightedly.
sentences.chinese: 贝尔坐在自家屋顶上乐滋滋地唱歌。

sentences.english: Kim Gabel says the bin needs holes so the worms can get air.
sentences.chinese: 金加贝尔说，孔斌需要这样的蠕虫可以得到空气。

sentences.english: Goldberg said researchers have been working with robots for 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 戈尔德贝尔格说研究人员50年来一直研究机器人。

sentences.english: He himself is a perennial Nobel also-ran.
sentences.chinese: 他自己就长年是诺贝尔和平奖落选者。

sentences.english: Sir Muir said he understood why Dr Campbell had withdrawn.
sentences.chinese: 缪尔爵士称，他明白坎贝尔博士为何退出了专家组。

sentences.english: And now he's on the fast track to win a Nobel prize.
sentences.chinese: 现在他要得诺贝尔奖简直探囊取物。

sentences.english: Because Damon warned Isobel to stay away from her.
sentences.chinese: 因为D警告伊莎贝尔远离E。

sentences.english: The Nobel has never been given out for applied sciences before.
sentences.chinese: 诺贝尔奖以前从未颁给过应用科学领域。

sentences.english: I met some of these patriotic Americans at Fort Campbell.
sentences.chinese: 我在坎贝尔堡见到了这些爱国的美国志士。

sentences.english: "Internationals are coming to park money here, " explained Campbell.
sentences.chinese: “其他国家开始把钱存在我们这里，”坎贝尔解释道。

sentences.english: The dinner took place at the Hotel Majestic, 19 Avenue Kléber, in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 晚宴在巴黎克莱贝尔大道19号的宏伟酒店内举行。

sentences.english: The three of them applauded, Isabel clapping her thigh.
sentences.chinese: 她们三个鼓起掌，伊萨贝尔拍拍她臀部。

definition: Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
